Title: The Enchiridion!
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Adam Muto (story by), Patrick McHale (story by), Pendleton Ward, Adam Muto, Patrick McHale
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Hynden Walch, Fred Tatasciore
Plot: Princess Bubblegum sends Finn on his most challenging quest yet--to recover The Enchiridion, the hero's handbook.
